turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you said you wanted that in a venti?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so you are ordering a black and white mocha, grande, with 2%, and with whipped cream, correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, one moment while i place that order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your receipt will be texted to you and your coffee should be ready for pickup in about 7 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
